name: Iconfinder
description: A REST JSON API for accessing a vast library of icons, icon sets, categories, and author details for design and development projects

about.overview: Iconfinder API provides programmatic access to millions of icons and icon sets, enabling designers and developers to search, retrieve, and integrate high-quality vector and raster icons into applications, with support for CORS and detailed metadata.
features: Search and filter icons by query, tags, or categories
Access detailed icon and icon set metadata
Support for vector and raster formats
Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for AJAX requests
useCases: Integrating icons into web and mobile applications
Enhancing design workflows with automated icon retrieval
Supporting creative projects with vector graphics

endpoints.description: Search for icons by query string and filter parameters
Retrieve details about a specific icon set

codeSnippets.python:
import requests
response = requests.get('https://api.iconfinder.com/v4/icons/search', params={'query': 'arrow'}, headers={'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'})

quickStart: Create an application at https://www.iconfinder.com/account to get an API key
Include the API key in the Authorization header as 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'
Make a GET request to https://api.iconfinder.com/v4/icons/search to search for icons

authentication.description: Include your API key in the Authorization header as 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' for all requests.
